poetry.name: Poetry
poetry.description: Participants given the opportunity to freely express themselves through writing, in any format that they desire.

journal.name: Journal
journal.description: Enables every person to share their story and anecdotes from daily life with a broader audience.

essays.name: Essays
essays.description: Writers are given a Word Theme and a Picture Theme and encouraged to submit writing for each theme. They also receive a newsletter with all the writing for that month.

art.name: Art
art.description: Offers the opportunity to explore the arts, led by Treacy Ziegler. Work may be showcased in public art exhibitions!

education.name: Education
education.description: Programs that offer instruction in a variety of subjects, including App Design, Chess, and Songwriting!

newsletter.name: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Contains selected work submitted by participants from the previous programming cycle and explains how new members can contribute to Prisoner Express.
